dbQuery.query: SELECT {COLUMNS_FILTER} FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY {ORDER_COLUMNS}) RWN, ID, CAD_NUM, RAYON_NUM FROM WEB50.KADASTR_KVARTAL WHERE {FILTER}) dd WHERE RWN BETWEEN {LOW_LIMIT} AND {HIGH_LIMIT}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM WEB50.KADASTR_KVARTAL WHERE {FILTER}

SELECT {COLUMNS_FILTER} FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY {ORDER_COLUMNS}) RWN,ID, MDR_ID, OBJ_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, STATION_BEGIN, STATION_END FROM (select MDR_ID ID, MDR_ID, OBJ_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, STATION_BEGIN, STATION_END from WEB50.KADASTR_PODS_MDR WHERE {FILTER}) dd) ff WHERE RWN BETWEEN {LOW_LIMIT} AND {HIGH_LIMIT}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM WEB50.KADASTR_PODS_MDR WHERE {FILTER}

SELECT {COLUMNS_FILTER} FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY {ORDER_COLUMNS}) RWN, ID, OBJ_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, STATION_BEGIN, STATION_END, CTIME, CUSER_ID, MTIME, MUSER_ID FROM (select ID, OBJ_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, STATION_BEGIN, STATION_END, CTIME, CUSER_ID, MTIME, MUSER_ID from WEB50.KADASTR_ALERT WHERE {FILTER}) dd) ff WHERE RWN BETWEEN {LOW_LIMIT} AND {HIGH_LIMIT}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM WEB50.KADASTR_ALERT WHERE {FILTER}

SELECT {COLUMNS_FILTER} FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY {ORDER_COLUMNS}) RWN,ID, TRACK_ID, OBJ_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, STATION_BEGIN, STATION_END,DATE_BEGIN,DATE_END, CTIME, CUSER_ID, MTIME, MUSER_ID FROM (select TRACK_ID ID, TRACK_ID, OBJ_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, STATION_BEGIN, STATION_END, DATE_BEGIN, DATE_END, CTIME, CUSER_ID, MTIME, MUSER_ID from WEB50.KADASTR_GKS_WAY WHERE {FILTER}) dd) ff WHERE RWN BETWEEN {LOW_LIMIT} AND {HIGH_LIMIT}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM WEB50.KADASTR_GKS_WAY WHERE {FILTER}

SELECT {COLUMNS_FILTER} FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY {ORDER_COLUMNS}) RWN,ID, ALERT_ID, OBJ_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, OWNER_NAME, ADDRESS, SQUARE, CTIME, CUSER_ID, MTIME, MUSER_ID FROM (select ID, ALERT_ID, OBJ_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, OWNER_NAME, ADDRESS, SQUARE, CTIME, CUSER_ID, MTIME, MUSER_ID from WEB50.KADASTR_ALERT_OBJECT WHERE {FILTER}) dd) ff WHERE RWN BETWEEN {LOW_LIMIT} AND {HIGH_LIMIT}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM WEB50.KADASTR_ALERT_OBJECT WHERE {FILTER}
